constants.description: This is value for to get Product with Code Product "Membership" when client pay for membership by Credit Card(DD), Product must be created by method createStandartProduct which location in apex-script folder.
constants.name: PRODUCT_MEMBERSHIP_CC

constants.description: This is value for to get Product with Code Product "Membership-CARE/DD" when client pay for membership by Direct Debit(DD), Product must be created by method createStandartProduct which location in apex-script folder.
constants.name: PRODUCT_MEMBERSHIP_DD

decisions.description: CC = Credit Card We check this because if Membership is with Partner we will need to add Contact Partner Id to Installment record. And then formula field(ga_decl_1__c,ga_decl_2__c ) check has or not gift aid declaration via LookUp.
decisions.name: Check_Membership_Options_CC
decisions.label: Check Membership Options CC

decisions.description: DD = Direct Debit We check this because if Membership is with Partner we will need to add Contact Partner Id to Installment record. And then formula field(ga_decl_1__c,ga_decl_2__c ) check has or not gift aid declaration via LookUp.
decisions.name: Check_Membership_Options_DD
decisions.label: Check Membership Options DD

Flow.description: v.1.1 Process where: 1. Membership Options 2. Payment Options(Credit Card, Direct Debit). 3. Gift Aid Declaration Options 4. Create a Sales Invoice(Api) 5. Add Bank Details(Api) 6. Get Payment Link.

fields.name: DD_Payment_Is_Not_Available_Text
fields.fieldText:
Unfortunately, direct debit membership payment is not available at this time.


﻿Please click Next to choose a different payment option.

screens.name: Direct_Debit_Bank_Account_Details_Screen
screens.label: Direct Debit Bank Account Details Screen

fields.name: Direct_Debit_Guarantee_Text
fields.fieldText:
The Direct Debit Guarantee

  • This Guarantee is offered by all banks and building societies that accept instructions to pay Direct Debits.
  • If there are any changes to the amount, date or frequency of your Direct Debit NCT will notify you 10 working days in advance of your account being debited or as otherwise agreed. If you request NCT to collect a payment, confirmation of the amount and date will be given to you at the time of the request.
  • If an error is made in the payment of your Direct Debit, by NCT or your bank or building society, you are entitled to a full and immediate refund of the amount paid from your bank or building society.
  • If you receive a refund you are not entitled to, you must pay it back when NCT asks you to.
  • ﻿You can cancel a Direct Debit at any time by simply contacting your bank or building society. Written confirmation may be required. Please also notify us.

fields.name: Direct_Debit_Bank_Account_Details_Text
fields.fieldText:
Direct debit details

If you are not the account holder or bank account requires more than one signatory then please ask our Enquiries team to send you a paper Direct Debit Instruction.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure that Account Name not more than 80 characters and is text.
Please make sure that the Bank Account Number consists of 8 digits and is numeric e.g '12345678'.
Please make sure that the Sort Code consists of 6 digits and is numeric e.g '123456'.

fields.name: Direct_Debit_Confirm_Text
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I'm authorised to debit from this account. I agree to NCT debiting my account as detailed above.

validationRule.errorMessage: Before you can continue, please indicate you have read and agreed to the terms and conditions

fields.name: Payment_Details_Info
fields.fieldText:
Pay by credit/debit card



To pay by credit or debit card using the secure Worldpay system, please select 'Proceed to payment'. You'll be redirected to the Worldpay site to complete your payment.


We don't see or store any of your debit or credit card information.


Please note: Credit cards levy higher charges on us than debit cards. We'd be grateful to you for supporting our charity by using a debit card if possible.

fields.name: Pay_For_Courses
fields.fieldText:
Payment options


{!Line_Image}



How would you like to pay for your course?﻿

fields.name: Pay_For_Membership
fields.fieldText:
{!Line_Image}


﻿How would you like to pay for your NCT membership?

textTemplates.name: Membership_12_Template
textTemplates.text:
12 month membership

12 months money off baby supplies, holidays and services when you help us continue being the leading charity for pregnancy and young families. £48 (or £12 per quarter)

textTemplates.name: Membership_18_Template
textTemplates.text:
18 month memberships

18 months money off baby supplies, holidays and services when you help us continue being the leading charity for pregnancy and young families. £57 (or £9.50 per quarter)

textTemplates.name: Membership_Options_Add_Partner_Label
textTemplates.text: Would you like to add partner?

textTemplates.text: Total amount due:    {!Total_Fee}
